Comments
July 9, 2022
AdamWarlock
This dial is actually a great option for ID card call-in or for sideline use as Dark Beast's experiment. That on-demand flurry he can lend out through Dark Beast or just use himself as a call-in placed into ideal position can be a nasty surprise. There aren't nearly as many pieces of 50 points or less with flurry on their top click as you would think.
January 3, 2022
The Singularity
Next to Agent May, this is my favorite figure of the set! what a value for only 25 points!!!
December 7, 2021
Goop
This might be one of the best figures in the set. 25pt prob with stealth and CR. You can flurry + incap back at them if they come after you or simply run away with his improved movement. Just incredibly strong for the points.
